body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello, thank you for contacting our support team. My name is Michael Foster and I'm with CleanStay Hotels. May I have your name, please?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Nice to meet you, Donna. As part of our verification process, may I please confirm your room number and the date of your stay with us?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Of course. My room number was five six two and the date of my stay was two zero zero three, the fifteenth of October.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you, Donna. I have noted down the details you provided. Now, could you kindly describe the cleanliness issue you encountered during your stay?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: I was surprised to find stains on the bedsheets and some leftover trash in the bathroom when I checked in.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: I apologize for the inconvenience, Donna. Your feedback is important to us in maintaining our standards. Is there anything else you'd like to share about your experience?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: No, that was all. I just wanted to bring these issues to your attention.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for sharing your concerns, Donna. We will investigate this matter further to ensure it doesn't happen again. We appreciate your time and feedback.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for choosing CleanStay Hotels. Have a great day! Goodbye.
